publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1601.2 Maureen Watt: Schools of Ambition—As an amendment to motion (S3M-1601) in the name of Rhona Brankin, leave out from "deplores" to end and insert "recognises that the Scottish Government has increased funding to Schools of Ambition in the Comprehensive Spending Review period 2008 to 2011 from £10.6 million to £11.5 million, and notes that two conferences will be held this summer which will share emerging lessons and demonstrate the variety of approaches taken by schools of ambition in order to embed these across the system which can help all local authorities and all schools to develop their own ambitious programmes for transformational change." Supported by: Adam Ingram*
